issues.description: Old-style clock edge detection using 'event attribute instead of falling_edge function
suggestions: Use falling_edge(clk) instead of (CLK'event and CLK='0')
Modern VHDL functions are more readable and less error-prone
issues.reasoning: Using falling_edge(clk) is the modern, recommended approach for detecting falling clock edges. Old-style 'event checks are more verbose and prone to errors.

issues.description: Missing spaces after commas in process sensitivity list
suggestions: Add spaces after commas in sensitivity list: 'process(x0, x1, S0, S1, S2, S3)' instead of 'process(x0,x1,S0,S1,S2,S3)'
issues.reasoning: Missing spaces after commas in lists reduces readability and violates VHDL style guidelines for comma-separated lists.
